OOC:  Damn!  I really messed up on my character's intros!  Sorry Airshadow!=
!!  I'll do a little correction with Orchestra, and pretend he didn't notic=
e the base!  Again, sorry everybody!

Orchestra/Symphony

       Orchestra =
was worried.  What could've happened to his brothers?  Oh, anything could h=
ave happened.  They could've been blown off course by a strong wind.  They =
could've been destroyed by enemy transformers.

        "DAMN!!!!  I'VE WAI=
TED SO LONG TO PLAY THIS MUSIC!!!!!!!!!!" He yelled out loud with anger.

 =
        "AND WHY DID I HAVE TO LAND IN A STINKIN' VOLCANO!!!!!!!  WHY??????=
?" He yelled again.

          Orchestra pulled out a alien-like weapon whi=
ch shot out blue plasma beams.

          "HEAR MY BOLERO OF THUNDER!!!  HE=
AR MY MINUET OF RAGE!!!!!!!" He yelled, this time firing his gun up at the =
air(the top of the volcano).

            He tapped a button on his gun, an=
d it turned into an object resembling a violin.  Orchestra got out a stick =
and started playing fast-paced, violent sounding music on the violin.  Thun=
der could be heard outside of the volcano.  Inside the volcano, small strea=
ks of lava appeared, growing a small bit bigger with every note.  As Orches=
tra's angry music went on, a circle of lava had formed around Orchestra.  T=
his went on, until finally Orchestra finished his little piece of music.  T=
he lava and other elements which the music had struck up disappeared.
 
   =
         "Played by the great Orchestra!!!!" Orchestra yelled with pride, b=
owing to nobody and raising his violin in the air.  He turned the button ba=
ck into a gun and put it away.

(Ok, if the base didn't hear that, then I d=
on't know what to do[Well, I do, but I'm trying to make you notice Orchestr=
a so that he can get factioned])
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~
      Symphony stopped his music, and then sent a message to all the Maxi=
mals of the CF through his com.

       "I wish to join you!  I come in pea=
ce, and I wish to join you!  You are my only chance at being heard!!!!" He =
begged.
